channel.title: SW-FRAMEWORK-Tensorflow2.0 on Memo
channel.description: Recent content in SW-FRAMEWORK-Tensorflow2.0 on Memo

item.description: Concept Tensorflow 2.0: Eager + Keras API Usage is completely different from Tensorflow1.x is equal to re-start Tensorflow1.0 When using tensorflow, the coding seems to be for the computer and not for people. First init session and global variables; The input variable should use the placeholder first. To run the program, you need session run. Building a deep learning network with operators / operands is very complicated. The main reason is that tensorflow needs to construct a (static) computation graph first.
